name: SledFairee
description:
[A Touhou Project Fangame entry for Touhou Fangame Jam 10] SledFairee Definitely not SkiFree

Sled your way down to the foot of the mountain. However, beware! Reimu is out to find you for eating her stash of snacks! You can play alone or play with friends locally. (Remotely too if you use PARSEC)

Controls
Keyboard - Arrow Keys / WASD
Gamepad - Left Stick
Joystick - Main Stick

Phone - Touch & Drag Up/Down/Left/Right
*While it is possible to play on a mobile device through the unity web player, your experience with your mobile device may vary

Credits
Rozarai - Game Designer + Programmer 
hp78 - Game Designer + Programmer 
Vento - Art Direction and Art
Vic - Voices (SFX)
JLam - Music
